items.content_html:
All Patreon memberships cancelled.

A couple I’ll be moving to Kofi.

My name is updated on Patreon to “Dr. Matt Lee (cancelled all Patreon memberships due to Patreon policies and restrictions)” — kinda hoping it makes it into the credits on a YouTube video now.

items.content_html: Back on Amtrak. Sadly today I’m not going very far at all.

items.content_html:
I’m going to cancel my Patreon subscriptions again this week. I’ll be reaching out to individuals to let them know.

It’s tiresome to have Patreon do this.

items.content_html: Happy to admit I’ve had emacs aliased to nova.app for the last year or so. Not the only editor I use but I haven’t used GNU Emacs/rmsmacs intentionally in a few years now.

items.content_html: Might just signing everything as “Millsy” for a week and see if anyone notices.
items.content_text: Might just signing everything as “Millsy” for a week and see if anyone notices.

items.content_html: I hope we have a United Ireland before we agree than both vim and emacs are fine.
items.content_text: I hope we have a United Ireland before we agree than both vim and emacs are fine.

items.content_html: To the guy at the bar bemoaning the lack of Bolocos that are still open. I hope you go to the two in Boston every possible day for the rest of your trip. Enjoy.
items.content_text: To the guy at the bar bemoaning the lack of Bolocos that are still open. I hope you go to the two in Boston every possible day for the rest of your trip. Enjoy.

items.content_html:
Haven’t gotten a political SMS yet that didn’t call me Matthew yet. How I know they’re pulling from some database.

If you want my attention, send me a DM or an email and you probably won’t get my name wrong, 100% legit political volunteers.

Also I already posted how I’m gonna vote.
items.content_text:

If you want my attention, send me a DM or an email and you probably won’t get my name wrong, 100% legit political volunteers. 

Also I already posted how I’m gonna vote.

Removed Discord from my phone.

I struggle to enjoy Discord at all.

items.content_text: Really want to know the name of the server in the Diners Drive Ins and Dives intro.

items.content_html: I missed the idea of traveling solo by train. I had no idea it was so controversial.
items.content_text: I missed the idea of traveling solo by train. I had no idea it was so controversial.

items.content_html: Wow. Just got a 30 day free trial of Apple TV+.
items.content_text: Wow. Just got a 30 day free trial of Apple TV+.

items.content_html: “I’m an early adopter of social media. 2017” — something dummies say.
items.content_text: “I’m an early adopter of social media. 2017” — something dummies say.

items.content_html:
Just played a game of the new Spearhead rules for Age of Sigmar. That’s a whole lot of fun.

#warhammer
items.content_text:
Just played a game of the new Spearhead rules for Age of Sigmar. That’s a whole lot of fun.

items.content_html: I think the first reference to Mario Kart in a movie is in My Fellow Americans. In the car chase bit “Nice going Mario” when they drive over the hill.
items.content_text: I think the first reference to Mario Kart in a movie is in My Fellow Americans. In the car chase bit “Nice going Mario” when they drive over the hill.

items.content_html: Would I do it again? ABSOLUTELY.
items.content_text: Would I do it again? ABSOLUTELY.

items.content_html: 9:46pm. Home with the cat and CSI is on.
items.content_text: 9:46pm. Home with the cat and CSI is on.

items.content_html:
99 hours and 15 mins since I left San Diego I’m back in Boston. Subtract 24 hours from that for the full day I spent extra in Chicago.

I’m home, it’s the evening, I’m not stressed.
items.content_text:
99 hours and 15 mins since I left San Diego I’m back in Boston. Subtract 24 hours from that for the full day I spent extra in Chicago.

I’m home, it’s the evening, I’m not stressed.

items.content_html: 8:32pm. Back in Boston.
items.content_text: 8:32pm. Back in Boston.

items.content_html: 8:03pm. Just leaving Framingham. Next stop is Boston. 98 hours since I left San Diego and wow… what a ride.
items.content_text: 8:03pm. Just leaving Framingham. Next stop is Boston. 98 hours since I left San Diego and wow… what a ride.

items.content_html: 5:06pm. Just heard from Farmers Fridge. They have some locations in Boston. This will be fun.
items.content_text: 5:06pm. Just heard from Farmers Fridge. They have some locations in Boston. This will be fun.

items.content_html: 3:15pm. Made it to Albany. Couldn’t find a vegetarian steamed ham anywhere. This is my final train of my cross country round trip journey.
items.content_text: 3:15pm. Made it to Albany. Couldn’t find a vegetarian steamed ham anywhere. This is my final train of my cross country round trip journey.

items.content_html: 2:43pm. I left San Diego 93 hours ago. In about 6 hours from now I should be home with my wife and our cat. Excited to see how the cat reacts to me being gone for a few weeks.
items.content_text: 2:43pm. I left San Diego 93 hours ago. In about 6 hours from now I should be home with my wife and our cat. Excited to see how the cat reacts to me being gone for a few weeks.

items.content_html:
1:11pm. Just passed through Utica and my phone says I’m near the Cooperstown baseball hall of fame but all I can see are old rusting trains and a building with broken windows.

I would have expected something a bit nicer for America’s game.
items.content_text:
1:11pm. Just passed through Utica and my phone says I’m near the Cooperstown baseball hall of fame but all I can see are old rusting trains and a building with broken windows. 

I would have expected something a bit nicer for America’s game.

items.content_html: 9:10am. Buffalo. Not ready to get up yet so back to sleep for me.
items.content_text: 9:10am. Buffalo. Not ready to get up yet so back to sleep for me.

items.content_html: Farmers Fridge. Sorry. Anyway really good.
items.content_text: Farmers Fridge. Sorry. Anyway really good.

items.content_html: Bought a chickpea wrap from a vending machine called Farmers Fresh at Chicago Union Station. It’s very nice. I wish we had more vending machines for serving up quirky offerings for travelers.
items.content_text: Bought a chickpea wrap from a vending machine called Farmers Fresh at Chicago Union Station. It’s very nice. I wish we had more vending machines for serving up quirky offerings for travelers.

items.content_html: Really thankful for all the interesting people I’ve met on this trip and I’ve had an amazing time so far. The next day is all about getting home but I’m still going to enjoy the rest of the travel. Now time to eat cheese in bed on a train.
items.content_text: Really thankful for all the interesting people I’ve met on this trip and I’ve had an amazing time so far. The next day is all about getting home but I’m still going to enjoy the rest of the travel. Now time to eat cheese in bed on a train.

items.content_html: 9:01pm. Sat in my sleeper roomette on the way back to Boston. It’s 10pm there and I’ll be home in approximately 21 hours from now.
items.content_text: 9:01pm. Sat in my sleeper roomette on the way back to Boston. It’s 10pm there and I’ll be home in approximately 21 hours from now.

items.content_html: 4:51pm. Getting the train out of Chicago in a few hours. I managed to snag a sleeper for tonight so that’ll be nice for my last night on the train. No dinner due to the late leaving time but I’ll get breakfast and lunch.
items.content_text: 4:51pm. Getting the train out of Chicago in a few hours. I managed to snag a sleeper for tonight so that’ll be nice for my last night on the train. No dinner due to the late leaving time but I’ll get breakfast and lunch.

items.content_html: 8:20pm. British person saying they’re into county music klaxon.
items.content_text: 8:20pm.  British person saying they’re into county music klaxon.

items.content_html: Get to see some Chicago Fire locations.
items.content_text: Get to see some Chicago Fire locations.

items.content_html: Chose to stay an extra night in Chicago.
items.content_text: Chose to stay an extra night in Chicago.

items.content_html: 5:37pm. In Chicago and having a beer before my 9:30pm train to Boston.
items.content_text: 5:37pm. In Chicago and having a beer before my 9:30pm train to Boston.

items.content_html: 4:04pm. 45 mins until arriving in Chicago, 2 hours late. This train was plagued by a delay early on and never managed to catch up.
items.content_text: 4:04pm. 45 mins until arriving in Chicago, 2 hours late. This train was plagued by a delay early on and never managed to catch up.

items.content_html: 1:48pm. Running about 90 minutes late.
items.content_text: 1:48pm. Running about 90 minutes late.

items.content_html: 11:57am. Crossed the Fort Madison bridge into Illinois.
items.content_text: 11:57am. Crossed the Fort Madison bridge into Illinois.

items.content_html: 11:42. I’m in Fort Madison, Iowa.
items.content_text: 11:42. I’m in Fort Madison, Iowa.

items.content_html: 7:56am. In Kansas City, MO. We’re arriving into Chicago in a few hours.
items.content_text: 7:56am. In Kansas City, MO. We’re arriving into Chicago in a few hours.

items.content_html:
9:04pm. About half way now.

882 miles W of Chicago 863 miles NE of Los Angeles

Tomorrow I’ll get into Chicago around 2:30pm. The train is running a little behind but they’re going to make up some of that overnight.
items.content_text:
9:04pm. About half way now. 

882 miles W of Chicago
863 miles NE of Los Angeles

Tomorrow I’ll get into Chicago around 2:30pm. The train is running a little behind but they’re going to make up some of that overnight.

items.content_html: 7pm. Now in Colorado for a short while but the train is running slightly behind schedule so I’ll spend the rest of the day in Colorado and hit Kansas around midnight central time. Time zones are confusing.
items.content_text: 7pm. Now in Colorado for a short while but the train is running slightly behind schedule so I’ll spend the rest of the day in Colorado and hit Kansas around midnight central time. Time zones are confusing.

items.content_html: 6:49pm. Just passed through the Raton Pass again.
items.content_text: 6:49pm. Just passed through the Raton Pass again.

items.content_html: 4:50pm. What’s a good photo sharing site/piece of software I can self install these days? Normally I’d put up a bunch of photos like the ones from my trip but I was shadow banned from Flickr and don’t want to put them on Instagram. Pixelfed will get some but I’m talking about uploading 900+ photos.
items.content_text: 4:50pm. What’s a good photo sharing site/piece of software I can self install these days? Normally I’d put up a bunch of photos like the ones from my trip but I was shadow banned from Flickr and don’t want to put them on Instagram. Pixelfed will get some but I’m talking about uploading 900+ photos.

items.content_html: 4:32pm. Just left the other Las Vegas.
items.content_text: 4:32pm. Just left the other Las Vegas.

items.content_html: 1:20pm. Leaving Albuquerque.
items.content_text: 1:20pm. Leaving Albuquerque.

items.content_html: 7:49am. Getting some breakfast in the dining car.
items.content_text: 7:49am. Getting some breakfast in the dining car.

items.content_html: 7:13am. Good morning. I slept through the night rather well. Woke up just a few minutes ago outside Winslow, AZ.
items.content_text: 7:13am. Good morning. I slept through the night rather well. Woke up just a few minutes ago outside Winslow, AZ.

items.content_html:
Watch a full length monkey movie I made for free. www.youtube.com/watch

Feel free to remix it, share it, etc.
items.content_text:
Watch a full length monkey movie I made for free. [www.youtube.com/watch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Vn0LLMHQKw)

Feel free to remix it, share it, etc.

items.content_html:
The people I appreciate the most on this trip are the service workers: bartenders, coffee shop staff, grocery store workers.

Tip people well.
items.content_text:
The people I appreciate the most on this trip are the service workers: bartenders, coffee shop staff, grocery store workers. 

Tip people well.

items.content_html: I’m on train 4. My home for the next 43 hours. I have a person across the aisle from me also going to Chicago. Contrast this to the 5 or six rows of fellow travelers on the way here.
items.content_text: I’m on train 4. My home for the next 43 hours. I have a person across the aisle from me also going to Chicago. Contrast this to the 5 or six rows of fellow travelers on the way here.

items.content_html: The fun thing about doing this in reverse will be seeing places I didn’t or couldn’t see the first time around. Last time I was here just outside LA it was 7:50am. Now it’s almost 5pm.
items.content_text: The fun thing about doing this in reverse will be seeing places  I didn’t or couldn’t see the first time around. Last time I was here just outside LA it was 7:50am. Now it’s almost 5pm.

items.content_html: Just like that the first train is done. Now I have a little bit of a wait until my next train which will take me from the Los Angeles area to Chicago over 43 hours.
items.content_text: Just like that the first train is done. Now I have a little bit of a wait until my next train which will take me from the Los Angeles area to Chicago over 43 hours.

items.content_html: Boarded for my first train from San Diego back to Boston. First stop will be just outside Los Angeles in about two hours.
items.content_text: Boarded for my first train from San Diego back to Boston. First stop will be just outside Los Angeles in about two hours.

items.content_html: I think that’s basically a wrap for me on another year of Comic-Con. Pictures to follow on my way home.
items.content_text: I think that’s basically a wrap for me on another year of Comic-Con. Pictures to follow on my way home.

items.content_html: My last full day in San Diego today. Tomorrow I take a train around lunchtime to the Los Angeles area and board a 43 hour train back to Chicago. On Tuesday I’ll be in Chicago for the day before taking a 20 hour train back to Boston.
items.content_text: My last full day in San Diego today. Tomorrow I take a train around lunchtime to the Los Angeles area and board a 43 hour train back to Chicago. On Tuesday I’ll be in Chicago for the day before taking a 20 hour train back to Boston.

items.content_html:
Getting ready to head into the Eisner Awards.

en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eisn…
items.content_text:
Getting ready to head into the Eisner Awards. 

[en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eisn...](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eisner_Awards)

items.content_html: Went to a panel on licensing. Turns out it’s not about licensing of games (ie. OGL) but licensing brands to make stuff like The Office branded Monopoly.
items.content_text: Went to a panel on licensing. Turns out it’s not about licensing of games (ie. OGL) but licensing brands to make stuff like The Office branded Monopoly.

items.content_html: Begging places to have a consistent usage of vegan and vegetarian labeling on menus. If you can label stuff as vegan you can also label stuff as vegetarian.
items.content_text: Begging places to have a consistent usage of vegan and vegetarian labeling on menus. If you can label stuff as vegan you can also label stuff as vegetarian.

items.content_html: Almost nobody with a mask on at Comic Con… not good. Thousands of people in a huge room together.
items.content_text: Almost nobody with a mask on at Comic Con… not good. Thousands of people in a huge room together.

items.content_html: It’s very hot here in San Diego but the food here is so good. If you’re at #sdcc2024 lmk. I’ll be the sweaty mess in the corner trying to eat another burrito.
items.content_text: It’s very hot here in San Diego but the food here is so good. If you’re at #sdcc2024 lmk. I’ll be the sweaty mess in the corner trying to eat another burrito.

items.content_html:
Amtrak food was good but nothing tasted better than my breakfast burrito from this place this morning.

Check out Cilantro Fresh Mexican www.yelp.com/biz/cilan…
items.content_text:
Amtrak food was good but nothing tasted better than my breakfast burrito from this place this morning. 

Check out Cilantro Fresh Mexican [www.yelp.com/biz/cilan...](https://www.yelp.com/biz/cilantro-fresh-mexican-los-angeles?uid=lBNeo3Md0WDlCQ8fLpiCMg&utm_source=ishare)

items.content_html: At the hotel. Time to eat cheese and watch Food Network. I’ve been handed snacks and a bottle of wine by Amtrak on the way here.
items.content_text: At the hotel. Time to eat cheese and watch Food Network. I’ve been handed snacks and a bottle of wine by Amtrak on the way here.

items.content_html: 12:59. Arrived San Diego.
items.content_text: 12:59. Arrived San Diego.

items.content_html: 11:40am. On a very full Pacific Surfliner Amtrak 770 down to San Diego. Sat on the good side of the train by sheer luck.
items.content_text: 11:40am. On a very full Pacific Surfliner Amtrak 770 down to San Diego. Sat on the good side of the train by sheer luck.

items.content_html:
10:03am. Getting ready to leave Los Angeles with a very full train of people heading to San Diego for #sdcc2024

Should be there in about 3 hours.
items.content_text:
10:03am. Getting ready to leave Los Angeles with a very full train of people heading to San Diego for #sdcc2024

Should be there in about 3 hours.

items.content_html: 8:32am. Arrived in Los Angeles.
items.content_text: 8:32am. Arrived in Los Angeles.

items.content_html:
5:35am. Woke up just as we left Victorville. A couple of hours left until we pull into Los Angeles.

A few minutes late on a couple stops but really not bad for such a long train. Should arrive into LA on time.

railrat.net/trains/3/
items.content_text:
5:35am. Woke up just as we left Victorville. A couple of hours left until we pull into Los Angeles. 

A few minutes late on a couple stops but really not bad for such a long train. Should arrive into LA on time. 

[railrat.net/trains/3/](https://railrat.net/trains/3/)

items.content_html:
If I ever get a drivers license and buy a car I want an observation car. I want to drive a glass box full of strangers around.

I should become a bus driver.
items.content_text:
If I ever get a drivers license and buy a car I want an observation car. I want to drive a glass box full of strangers around. 

I should become a bus driver.

items.content_html: 8:36pm. Oh yeah this 73 hour, 4 day train thing? I’m doing it again on Sunday.
items.content_text: 8:36pm. Oh yeah this 73 hour, 4 day train thing? I’m doing it again on Sunday.

items.content_html: 8:27pm. I’m now on California time. Had dinner on the train. No photos but same as yesterday. It’s funny how immediately people hear my accent and immediately try to figure out if I’m pro-Trump or not. Maybe it’s the Joy Division shirt. Very happy on the train.
items.content_text: 8:27pm. I’m now on California time. Had dinner on the train. No photos but same as yesterday. It’s funny how immediately people hear my accent and immediately try to figure out if I’m pro-Trump or not. Maybe it’s the Joy Division shirt. Very happy on the train.

items.content_html:
6:46pm. Made it to Gallup, NM.

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gallup,_New_Mexico
items.content_text:
6:46pm. Made it to Gallup, NM. 

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gallup,_New_Mexico

items.content_html: 4:24pm. Leaving Albuquerque. Hopefully we catch up a bit now.
items.content_text: 4:24pm. Leaving Albuquerque. Hopefully we catch up a bit now.

items.content_html:
Took advantage of the longer break in Albuquerque to step off the train and into the excellent Silver Street Market. A full grocery store a few steps from the train. Picked up the essentials: RC Cola, Gatorade, a Green Monster juice, diet Mountain Dew and a box of Mike and Ike’s.

#mattltrain
items.content_text:
Took advantage of the longer break in Albuquerque to step off the train and into the excellent Silver Street Market. A full grocery store a few steps from the train. Picked up the essentials: RC Cola, Gatorade, a Green Monster juice, diet Mountain Dew and a box of Mike and Ike’s. 

#mattltrain

items.content_html:
2:28pm. En route to Albuquerque. They warned us the train would be bumpy for a bit as it’s on a dirt road.

Some cool old trains at Lamy, NM.

Albuquerque will be approximately 45 minute break so I’m going to get off and stretch my legs.
items.content_text:
2:28pm. En route to Albuquerque. They warned us the train would be bumpy for a bit as it’s on a dirt road.

Some cool old trains at Lamy, NM. 

Albuquerque will be approximately 45 minute break so I’m going to get off and stretch my legs.

9:14am in Trinidad, Colorado. This is the last stop before New Mexico.

Train ahead of mine had some delays, so far we’re only 20 mins delayed.

railrat.net/trains/3/

#mattltrain

Train ahead of mine had some delays, so far we’re only 20 mins delayed.

items.content_html: 7:56am (now in Mountain Time) just had a Coke Zero and a Blueberry Muffin for breakfast. In La Junta, Colorado. Charging up my devices for the last full day on the train. Slept better last night.
items.content_text: 7:56am (now in Mountain Time) just had a Coke Zero and a Blueberry Muffin for breakfast. In La Junta, Colorado. Charging up my devices for the last full day on the train. Slept better last night.

items.content_html: 4:55am. Waking up on the outskirts of Dodge City, Kansas. Time to sleep for a bit longer.
items.content_text: 4:55am. Waking up on the outskirts of Dodge City, Kansas. Time to sleep for a bit longer.

items.content_html: 11:18pm. People in front of me won’t stop talking and I can hear them with earplugs. It’s quieter in the common areas where people aren’t supposed to be talking.
items.content_text: 11:18pm. People in front of me won’t stop talking and I can hear them with earplugs. It’s quieter in the common areas where people aren’t supposed to be talking.

items.content_html: 10:18pm. Kansas City now. Quiet time on the train starts now so I took some Zzzquil. My new seat mate and I already spoke about Warhammer.
items.content_text: 10:18pm. Kansas City now. Quiet time on the train starts now so I took some Zzzquil. My new seat mate and I already spoke about Warhammer.

items.content_html: 9:25pm. Ate dinner on the train. It was oddly bumpy. It already feels better back in my seat. Dinner was a Brie salad, pasta primavera, cheesecake and thanks to my Canadian dining partner, two alcoholic drinks. A wonderful conversation with everyone. Paying with Venmo worked too. Thankfully.
items.content_text: 9:25pm. Ate dinner on the train. It was oddly bumpy. It already feels better back in my seat. Dinner was a Brie salad, pasta primavera, cheesecake and thanks to my Canadian dining partner, two alcoholic drinks. A wonderful conversation with everyone. Paying with Venmo worked too. Thankfully.

items.content_html: 7:32pm. LaPlata, MO. It’s raining outside the train. Everyone is telling everyone it’s raining. The cafe car is closed for a bit now. I’m going to eat soon. The next stop isn’t for a few hours now. Kansas City, MO. Internet access is getting worse.
items.content_text: 7:32pm. LaPlata, MO. It’s raining outside the train. Everyone is telling everyone it’s raining. The cafe car is closed for a bit now. I’m going to eat soon. The next stop isn’t for a few hours now. Kansas City, MO. Internet access is getting worse.

items.content_html: 6:10pm. Arriving into Fort Madison, Iowa for the first scheduled leg stretch break. Lot of people getting off for a smoke here.
items.content_text: 6:10pm. Arriving into Fort Madison, Iowa for the first scheduled leg stretch break. Lot of people getting off for a smoke here.

items.content_html: Have found a reasonable spot in the observation area with a table for me to read my ebook. I got my earlier times mixed up. It is now 4:28pm.
items.content_text: Have found a reasonable spot in the observation area with a table for me to read my ebook. I got my earlier times mixed  up. It is now 4:28pm.

items.content_html: 5:28pm. Having quickly abandoned the chatterbox for the observation car I decided to book myself in for the dining car too. $45 for a three course dinner on the train. Pricy but I’m starting to feel hungrier than yesterday at this time.
items.content_text: 5:28pm. Having quickly abandoned the chatterbox for the observation car I decided to book myself in for the dining car too. $45 for a three course dinner on the train. Pricy but I’m starting to feel hungrier than yesterday at this time.

items.content_html: 4:28pm. A few minutes late leaving. One guy in my section of the train hasn’t stopped talking for more than 45 seconds since he got on the train.
items.content_text: 4:28pm. A few minutes late leaving. One guy in my section of the train hasn’t stopped talking for more than 45 seconds since he got on the train.

items.content_html: 1pm. Just ate a threatening tiny piece of chocolate called “AWAKE” with an owl on the package. Going to get a sandwich for later in a few minutes.
items.content_text: 1pm. Just ate a threatening tiny piece of chocolate called “AWAKE” with an owl on the package. Going to get a sandwich for later in a few minutes.

items.content_html: 11:47am. Took a recommendation and left the station for the nearest dive bar. Having an Old Style and listening to EDM.
items.content_text: 11:47am. Took a recommendation and left the station for the nearest dive bar. Having an Old Style and listening to EDM.

items.content_html: 10:40am. I am reminded that like many people who grew up in the UK I don’t easily remember time zones. Anyway I’m in Central time now and making good use of the world clock.
items.content_text: 10:40am. I am reminded that like many people who grew up in the UK I don’t easily remember time zones. Anyway I’m in Central time now and making good use of the world clock.

items.content_html: 10:26am. Sat in the Amtrak lounge with a Coke Zero and a muffin. Going to go wandering around shortly.
items.content_text: 10:26am. Sat in the Amtrak lounge with a Coke Zero and a muffin. Going to go wandering around shortly.

items.content_html:
9:47am. Arriving into Chicago. First train done. I feel a little tired because I only got maybe four/five hours of sleep last night. I have a few hours in Chicago and then 43 hours on the train to Los Angeles.

This train kept to the schedule pretty well. railrat.net/trains/49…

#mattltrain
items.content_text:
9:47am. Arriving into Chicago. First train done. I feel a little tired because I only got maybe four/five hours of sleep last night. I have a few hours in Chicago and then 43 hours on the train to Los Angeles. 

This train kept to the schedule pretty well. [railrat.net/trains/49...](https://railrat.net/trains/49/)

#mattltrain

items.content_html: 9:19am. Just spoke to helpful person at my bank so a replacement card should be with me very soon. In South Bend, IN. Last stop before Chicago.
items.content_text: 9:19am. Just spoke to helpful person at my bank so a replacement card should be with me very soon. In South Bend, IN. Last stop before Chicago.

items.content_html: 8:04am. Waterloo, Indiana. The family I met and was chatting to have left the train after their trip to Vermont and back.
items.content_text:
8:04am. Waterloo, Indiana. The family
I met and was chatting to have left the train after their trip to Vermont and back.

items.content_html:
Hurtling through the Midwest this morning at 78 mph.

About to leave Ohio and enter Indiana. At some point soon I’ll change timezones too.
items.content_text:
Hurtling through the Midwest this morning at 78 mph. 

About to leave Ohio and enter Indiana. At some point soon I’ll change timezones too.

items.content_html: 6:44am. I’m in Toledo, OH. Four hours until Chicago.
items.content_text: 6:44am. I’m in Toledo, OH. Four hours until Chicago.

items.content_html: 5:50am. Woke up in Sandusky, OH. Slept pretty good overall. Time to wake up now.
items.content_text: 5:50am. Woke up in Sandusky, OH. Slept pretty good overall. Time to wake up now.

items.content_html: Feeling very grateful today. I don’t often get to do silly things like take a 73 hour train across the country but I’m very happy that my life has turned out the way it has to put me in this situation where I get to be a train weirdo in another country I wasn’t born in. I’m very lucky.
items.content_text: Feeling very grateful today. I don’t often get to do silly things like take a 73 hour train across the country but I’m very happy that my life has turned out the way it has to put me in this situation where I get to be a train weirdo in another country I wasn’t born in. I’m very lucky.

items.content_html: Tomorrow I get breakfast in Chicago, use of the lounge at the station and the observation car where I can spend most of my time looking out the window while also reading on my Kindle or listening to my iPod. Yes I brought an actual iPod. I also brought a shortwave radio. #mattltrain
items.content_text: Tomorrow I get breakfast in Chicago, use of the lounge at the station and the observation car where I can spend most of my time looking out the window while also reading on my Kindle or listening to my iPod. Yes I brought an actual iPod. I also brought a shortwave radio. #mattltrain

items.content_html: Lights are down low on the train. I have two seats to myself and my makeshift bed. Had an amazing day that started poorly with my debit card being eaten by an ATM but I’m ending the day surrounded by a family from the Midwest who’ve been really friendly. No idea how well I will sleep in my Uniqlo clothes I bought to sleep in but I’ll find out soon. #mattltrain
items.content_text: Lights are down low on the train. I have two seats to myself and my makeshift bed. Had an amazing day that started poorly with my debit card being eaten by an ATM but I’m ending the day surrounded by a family from the Midwest who’ve been really friendly. No idea how well I will sleep in my Uniqlo clothes I bought to sleep in but I’ll find out soon. #mattltrain

items.content_html: Utica… apparently I’m near the baseball hall of fame but it’s also 9:30pm and dark
items.content_text: Utica… apparently I’m near the baseball hall of fame but it’s also 9:30pm and dark

items.content_html:
An hour ago: Almost to Albany, NY. Here I get to get off the train for about 45 mins and stretch my legs.

Now: Getting ready to leave Albany and head to Chicago.
items.content_text:
An hour ago: Almost to Albany, NY. Here I get to get off the train for about 45 mins and stretch my legs.

items.content_html:
I made it to Pittsfield, MA. Hometown of Elizabeth Banks and there’s a bunch of very faded photos of Ted Kennedy on the way into the station.

mat.tl/trains/20…

#mattltrain

Amtrak WiFi is showing approximately 0.3mbps for a train full of people.

My personal hotspot is giving me about 10mbps up and down.

asm.transitdocs.com

items.content_text: Now seated and watching Psych on my iPad.

items.content_html: Crisis averted thanks to Max and Ali. On the first train now where I’ll be until tomorrow morning.
items.content_text: Crisis averted thanks to Max and Ali. On the first train now where I’ll be until tomorrow morning.

items.content_html: My bank chose today to have an ATM eat my debit card. Really not happy.
items.content_text: My bank chose today to have an ATM eat my debit card. Really not happy.

items.content_html:
Just under five hours before I embark on my 76 hour train journey across the US.

I just received word that my bid to upgrade to a roomette from Chicago to LA wasn’t high enough but I’m hoping to spend most of my trip in the observation area anyway.
items.content_text:
Just under five hours before I embark on my 76 hour train journey across the US. 

I just received word that my bid to upgrade to a roomette from Chicago to LA wasn’t high enough but I’m hoping to spend most of my trip in the observation area anyway.

#sdcc2024 #amtrak

items.content_html:
Heading to San Diego Comic-con. I’ll be back in about 9 days.

Looking forward to a week of not answering messages, reading social media or worrying about email.

Be well and I’ll speak to you all again soon enough 💛
items.content_text:
Heading to San Diego Comic-con. I’ll be back in about 9 days. 

Looking forward to a week of not answering messages, reading social media or worrying about email. 

Be well and I’ll speak to you all again soon enough 💛

items.content_html:
In my 16 years of making free/open social networks, the thing that really ends up grinding at you is the personal connections you make along the way.

I’m fairly on the record about how much I wasn’t a good project leader for GNU social. Ian’s death is sadly another in the history of free social networking and I am sad.
items.content_text:
In my 16 years of making free/open social networks, the thing that really ends up grinding at you is the personal connections you make along the way. 

I’m fairly on the record about how much I wasn’t a good project leader for GNU social. Ian’s death is sadly another in the history of free social networking and I am sad.

items.content_html: My Analogue SuperNt and Mega Sg FPGA video game consoles finally shipped! Just in time for me to leave town for over a week.
items.content_text: My Analogue SuperNt and Mega Sg FPGA video game consoles finally shipped! Just in time for me to leave town for over a week.

items.content_html:
A month until I get on a plane for the first time in four years and head to San Diego for Comic-Con.

The last time I left New England was in early 2019 when I was the keynote speaker at CUSEC in Montreal. That was also the last time I did any kind of conference-thing.

items.content_html: If anyone ever asks me what my job is I tell them I’m a monorail driver at a zoo. This was especially fun for me when taking the Caltrain to Mountain View, CA… so many people eager to switch tech jobs. I’d explain away any tech t-shirt if I was wearing as “I found this at Goodwill”

items.content_html: A bus and two convenient trains. I didn’t need to ride the bus but I would like more buses, so riding may help. Funny thing about my commute is that if I leave at 9am or 9:30am it seems to take about the same amount of time. Maybe I’m just perpetually late.
items.content_text: A bus and two convenient trains. I didn’t need to ride the bus but I would like more buses, so riding may help. Funny thing about my commute is that if I leave at 9am or 9:30am it seems to take about the same amount of time. Maybe I’m just perpetually late.

items.content_html: I like to ride the airport shuttle. I like to take the free bus to work. I like to board a bus full of people with bags and have no bag. I like to take the hotel shuttle from the airport and see what else is going on around the hotels near the airport. I like what I’m finding.
items.content_text: I like to ride the airport shuttle. I like to take the free bus to work. I like to board a bus full of people with bags and have no bag. I like to take the hotel shuttle from the airport and see what else is going on around the hotels near the airport. I like what I’m finding.
